body:
### Problem

Following error occurs on nvim start with the setup in the reproduce section:

```
Error detected while processing BufReadPost Autocommands for "*":                               
Error executing lua callback: /usr/local/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:36: BufReadPost Autocom
mands for "*"..FileType Autocommands for "*": Vim(append):Error executing lua callback: /usr/loc
al/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/lsp.lua:468: cmd: expected function|table, got nil                
stack traceback:                                                                                
        [C]: in function 'error'                                                                
        vim/shared.lua: in function 'validate'                                                  
        /usr/local/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/lsp.lua:468: in function '_resolve_config'        
        /usr/local/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/lsp.lua:499: in function 'lsp_enable_callback'    
        /usr/local/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/lsp.lua:553: in function </usr/local/share/nvim/ru
ntime/lua/vim/lsp.lua:552>                                                                      
        [C]: in function 'nvim_cmd'                                                             
        /usr/local/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:36: in function </usr/local/share/nvim/runtim
e/filetype.lua:35>                                                                              
        [C]: in function 'pcall'                                                                
        vim/shared.lua: in function <vim/shared.lua:0>                                          
        [C]: in function '_with'                                                                
        /usr/local/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:35: in function </usr/local/share/nvim/runtim
e/filetype.lua:10>                                                                              
stack traceback:                                                                                
        [C]: in function '_with'                                                                
        /usr/local/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:35: in function </usr/local/share/nvim/runtim
e/filetype.lua:10>
```                                      

### Steps to reproduce

Start nvim with the following user runtime:

```
nvim
      init.lua
      lua/lsp/luals.lua
```

in `init.lua`:

```lua
vim.lsp.enable('luals')
```

in `lua/lsp/luals.lua`:

```lua
vim.lsp.config('luals', {
  cmd = { 'lua-language-server' },
  filetypes = { 'lua' },
  root_markers = { '.luarc.json', '.luarc.jsonc', '.stylua.toml', 'stylua.toml', '.luacheckrc', '.git' },
  -- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LuaLS/vscode-lua/master/setting/schema.json
  settings = {
    Lua = {
      runtime = {
        version = 'LuaJIT',
      },
    },
  },
}
```


### Expected behavior

According to `:h lsp-config` which says:

```
Configurations for LSP clients is done via vim.lsp.config().

When an LSP client starts, it resolves a configuration by merging
configurations, in increasing priority, from the following:

1. Configuration defined for the '*' name.

2. Configuration from the result of sourcing all `lsp/<name>.lua` files
   in 'runtimepath' for a server of name `name`.

   Note: because of this, calls to vim.lsp.config() in lsp/*.lua are
   treated independently to other calls. This ensures configurations
   defined in lsp/*.lua have a lower priority.

3. Configurations defined anywhere else.
```

I expected my `lua/lsp/luals.lua` file to be sourced when I called `vim.lsp.enable('luals')`, like in priority number 2 above.

### Nvim version (nvim -v)

v0.11.0 commit g38f554e9c4    

### Vim (not Nvim) behaves the same?

n/a

### Operating system/version

macOS

### Terminal name/version

kitty

### $TERM environment variable

xterm-kitty

### Installation

source

comment_data.body:
You need to place the file in lsp/, not lua/lsp/.  

Of course there still should not be an error.
oh oops, I totally assumed `lua/` prefix, thanks!

Re-opening because I moved the `luals.lua` into the right spot, from `lua/lsp/luals.lua` to `lsp/luals.lua`, and I'm still getting the same error:

in `init.lua`:

```lua
vim.lsp.enable('luals')
```

in `lsp/luals.lua`:

```lua
vim.lsp.config('luals', {
  cmd = { 'lua-language-server' },
  filetypes = { 'lua' },
  root_markers = { '.luarc.json', '.luarc.jsonc', '.stylua.toml', 'stylua.toml', '.luacheckrc', '.git' },
  -- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LuaLS/vscode-lua/master/setting/schema.json
  settings = {
    Lua = {
      runtime = {
        version = 'LuaJIT',
      },
    },
  },
}
```

still get this error on start:

```
Error detected while processing BufReadPost Autocommands for "*":                               
Error executing lua callback: /usr/local/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:36: BufReadPost Autocommands for "*"..FileType Autocommands for "*": Vim(append):Error executing lua callback: /usr/local/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/lsp.lua:468: cmd: expected function|table, got nil                
stack traceback:                                                                                
        [C]: in function 'error'                                                                
        vim/shared.lua: in function 'validate'                                                  
        /usr/local/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/lsp.lua:468: in function '_resolve_config'        
        /usr/local/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/lsp.lua:499: in function 'lsp_enable_callback'    
        /usr/local/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/lsp.lua:553: in function </usr/local/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/lsp.lua:552>                                                                      
        [C]: in function 'nvim_cmd'                                                             
        /usr/local/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:36: in function </usr/local/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:35>                                                                              
        [C]: in function 'pcall'                                                                
        vim/shared.lua: in function <vim/shared.lua:0>                                          
        [C]: in function '_with'                                                                
        /usr/local/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:35: in function </usr/local/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:10>                                                                              
stack traceback:                                                                                
        [C]: in function '_with'                                                                
        /usr/local/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:35: in function </usr/local/share/nvim/runtime/filetype.lua:10>    
```

labels.description: issues that are closed as usage questions
labels.name: closed:question

title: `vim.lsp.enable('luals')` in init.lua fails if using `lsp/luals.lua` for `vim.lsp.config` call
